title: What are famous food spots in Satara? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well if you are exploring some interesting food spots in Satara you must visitRajwada ‘RAJWADA’-a heaven for foodies Mastani house Mastani house is a must visit place in summers  Domino's Pizza lovers must rush to dominoes Sai inamdar misal Sai inamdar misal is worth tasting. A small place but you will get the best misal here. Backbenchers çafe For teens best place is backbenchers cafe  ‘RAJPUROHIT’ Well this is a place where my family loves to go.RAJPUROHIT sweet marts are the largest sweet marts in Satara.  Near Oriental Bank of Commerce, Visawa Park, Sadar Bazar, Satara, Maharashtra 415001Open today 8AM–10PMGreat variety of food products.Clean, hygienic n good serviceClassic Satarakar Taste. Awesome in Breakfast. Samosa, Kanda Kadhori and Dhokla are highlights. You can have KandiPedha (signature sweet of Satara )

The most famous food spot in Satara is the Supnekars Snack Van located at the Snacks zone near Rajwada chowk , It operates in the evenings only. You can locate it easily as it is the most crowded Van and people of all ages enjoy the snacks of high quality and best taste there. You get Misal, Batata vada, sabudana vada, Bhaji (Pakoda), Pattice here . Next is Samrat Vada Pav cart near Panchmukhi Ganapati on the lower main road/ Sadashiv Peth. you get only vada pav here. One more is Kabadi snack centre opposite Rayat Shikshan Sanstha, near IDBI Bank /Powai naka. you will get Pav Bhaji and Chinese food here.
